name: Cyberwinter
description:
Cyberwinter is an isometric action strategy game. On a distant planet with a harsh climate, you have to fight legions of dangerous monsters for a new home for humanity. Build bases, develop and defend them.

Main features:

  • Enjoy an interesting story. Unravel the mystery of a lost civilization and determine the fate of the future;

  • Think, and only then do. Resources are extremely limited, build only what you really need;

  • Defeat the strongest. Thick and dangerous enemies will make your palms sweat;

  • Control the power. A variety of combat vehicles will make your gaming experience even more interesting.
